text: E fo, God a biziba bar dar mɨngarim, egha a biziba bar dar ingari. Egha kamaghɨn ifonge, Iesus uan borir avɨriba me inigh egh men aku Godɨn Nguibamɨn mangam, eghtɨ me Iesus ko ziar ekiam iniam. God kamaghɨn ifonge, Iesus gumazamizibar akurvaghamin ingangarim damuam, kamaghɨn amizɨ a Iesus ataghizɨma a mɨzazim isi. Ezɨ mɨzazir kam Iesus gamima a gumazamizibar akurvaghamin gumazir bar faragha zuimɨn otogha, egha tuavim men aka. Arazir God a gamir kam, a bar dera.
